title: Pakistan - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Pakistan stands at B- with negative outlook. Moody's credit rating for Pakistan was last set at Caa1 with negative outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Pakistan was last reported at CCC+ with n/a outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Pakistan thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Pakistan as reported by major credit rating agencies.
